body:
Hello! :D So I was looking into getting Emerald, but I am already gold.
If I get Emerald, will I only have to pay $25 dollars, (It would add up to $50 because of my gold) or would I have to pay the whole amount of $50? Thank you for taking your time to read this :)

replies.body: Listen, if you need help, contact a mod. Plus, if you did buy Emerald, do not worry, it will come, it just might take time. Do not spam it on the forums.
